channel.title: Little question in safezones
channel.description:
the coords: ne = 2748, 3480 nw = 2728, 3478 se = 2748, 3458 sw = 2725, 3458
i need the coords in this format...but which go where??? [code] (absX >=xxxx && absX <=xxxx && absY >=xxxx && absY <=xxxx ) [/code] now can some 1 tell me what do do next? can you just give mwe the code i am so lost... :( [br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 10:08:28 PM[/size][hr]do i set ne and se in 1 bracket and nw and sw in another??

item.title: Little question in safezones
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

(absX >= SW_X && absX <= NE_X && absY >= SW_Y && absY <= NE_Y)

SW_X is the Southwest X coordinate
NE_X is the Northeast X coordinate
SW_Y is the Southwest Y coordinate
NE_Y is the Northeast Y coordinate

And by southeast and northeast, think of it as a box/square.

-----------------(NE_X, NE_Y)
| |
| |
| |
(SW_X, SW_Y)-------

And to rest of you idiots who do not know they’re cardinal directions, I have four words for you: That is just sad.

Read full topic

public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat) // by qwert

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 10:29:53 PM[/size][hr][code]
public boolean inSafezone() { // by qwert
if((absX >=2708  && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149  && absY <=3235 ) || 

(absX >=3464  && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480  && absY <=9519 ) || 

(absX >=2438  && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082  && absY <=3098 ) || 

(absX >=3545  && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267  && absY <=3308 ) || 

(absX >=2812  && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230  && absY <=3310 ) || 

(absX >=2705  && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800  && absY <=9832 ) || 

(absX >=2528  && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710  && absY <=4725 ) || 

(absX >=2370  && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125  && absY <=6169 ) || 

(absX >=3021  && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816  && absY <=4850 ) || 

(absX >=2728  && absX <=2750 && absY >=3478  && absY <=3460 ) || 
(absX >=2508  && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627  && absY <=4670 ) ||
(absX >=2728  && absX <=2748 && absY >=3480  && absY <=3458 ) ||
{
return true;
}
else
{
return false;
}
}
public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat) // by qwert
{
if(((combat + WildyLevel >= pcombat) && (pcombat >= combat)) || 

((combat - WildyLevel <= pcombat) && (pcombat <= combat)))
{
InWildrange = true;
}
else
{
InWildrange = true;
}
}

item.title: Little question in safezones
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

You only need to fill in 1 box of X and Y

IE:

(absX >=2728  && absX <=2748 && absY >=3480  && absY <=3458 )

Should work

X goes right/left Y goes up/down so this is and example

X---------------------Y
| |
| |
| |
| |
Y---------------------X

So like go to the 1st corner, NW for 1st put the X coord in then go to NE side and put the Y coords in and so on that make it simple?
